Headings: Waste of time. Misleading customers to use it with low estimate, actual charges signif
Content: Tried using Ola a few times recently.First occasion, driver called and asked destination, then canceled tripSecond occasion, the ETA was 13mins. Waited much longer than this as driver was not moving in direction, then suddenly after waiting 20mins driver canceled.Third occasion, no issues with driver or car, however, Ola app showed estimate of 32-42, actual fare was $56, no significant traffic and driver went most direct route. Would have used Uber with a fixed fare of $46 if I knew this was going to happen. Not the first time either.

Headings: ‪first ride with them
Content: ‪first ride with them - a passenger definately left a mobile phone on the back seat of their car the driver denied ever seeing it, contacted ola they said they will look into it, I’m not saying the driver took it but the phone was left in their car so either the driver or a passenger who was riding after us took it, so contacted them via twitter hoping they will be of any help, maybe will contact the next passenger or something. today I’ve received a voicemail from them couldnt understand a word the person was saying the voicemail was listened by several people and no one was able to understand what was being said, I only figured out who was calling after googling the number, contacted them again asking if they know what was the reason of their call however I’ve been ignored . Avoid!‬

Headings: 3 rides with OLA, not one more!!!
Content: 3 rides with OLA.First was ok, very short with the first voucher.Second was poor, the driver took wrong routes, and made me arrive late.Third is SHOCKING: driver was refused a priority, and tried to force his way until he had to jump on the brakes...Which is already unacceptable when you have driver's licence, not to mention customers in the car.Then he said "I have to stop this guy", proceeded to block the car and started fighting with the other driver, took out a metal stick from under the driver's seat and tried to hit the guy.He got pushed away and I ordered him to get in the car and drive!Even tough the driver apologized many times, this guy shouldn't have a driver's license and shouldn't be hauling customers.Do not get tricked into thinking this app and service is cheaper than Uber because it isn't, and the service BAD and could be dangerous.STAY FROM OLA!!!

Headings: I have worked so hard and put so many…
Content: I have worked so hard and put so many hours but didn’t get paid my hard earned money. I called them to find out what’s happening, they said my payment is under check and will receive it in 24 hours, after 24 hours no payment came in my account called again it will take Another 24 hours nothing came in it’s been one week now they telling me some fraudulent activity took place I asked them for clarification they said the customer didn’t take trip, the passengers all I take all gave me a code to start the trip how did the passengers manage to get the code if the actually not requested a ride that doesn’t make a sense now i can’t pay the rent if the car nor the rent of the house their customers services are lied to me they all giving me false information it’s the worst company to work for if I don’t receive my hard earned money am gonna take them to tribunal and inform the media how they are scamming us drivers

Headings: Scammers and liars in London
Content: Scammers and liars in London, drivers please beware they promise to pay you incentive but don’t actually do. Unprofessional staff, kept on lying about the incentive and ola plans. They kicked me off from the plan without prior notice and kept on lying while day that it’s a glitch in the app.They didn’t pay me ride fare guarantee now I have a family to feed and bills to pay on weekly basis and I’m stuck in the situation where can’t get help from anyone. I worked more than 50 hours including peak hours and at the pay day staff kept lying I’ll get paid and at the end they just say no to the payments.Definitely not a company to work with.We don’t accept things like this in London that’s not how London works and Londoners definitely don’t accept such rude and cunning behaviour.Definitely taking them to court and lodging a complaint with TFL.They have breached the TFL’s trust and most of all people’s trust. If TFL keeps giving licenses to such con companies we’d be broke and starve.

Headings: Scammed with £20

Headings: Am i waiter , Am i dj , Ah i am cab driver (Slave)
Content: I had order from ola the guys were standing at tesco parking when i accepted the job it showed local job but when reached the pick up point they add stops and changed the drop off point as well so i said to them that i want to finish soon so sorry i can take this ride because you guys have long ride. So next thing as you all guys know there is no respect for cab drivers. As soon customer place order they think they owns your car and owns you. So those 4 guys start swearing at me and threating me that they will damage my car and myself as well so i start requesting please your ride is cancel so can you please leave my car but they we not gona leave my car until they will get the next driver. So when they got the next ride after 15 minutes they left all door opens they open the boot gloves box and run away. I spoke to ola they said relevant team will take action but nothing happened. Its request to all cab drivers we always complaining for money we need to thing about respect and life safety. People need to understand we are not slaves we deserve respect we are not obliged to listen everyone music we are not dj's our responsbility to drop customers from A to B thats it. Customers knows that food and drinks not allow in taxi but they delibratly eat and drink because they owns you. Respect and safety is impotant for drivers.

Headings: Unfair, silly customer service.
Content: I ordered a ride, used their £5 voucher plus whatever the cost, it broke down in the middle of the trip, I was still charged. I had to order second one and waste extra 20 mins. I payed full price which came to triple the original estimate. Tried calling them, took a while for them to answer, but was only offered a first rides fare back. When I asked them to fix the situation by at least refunding all the excess of the original trip estimate, they refused and said tgat the system can not do it. I tried email, but did not hear back. Worst customer service I had to deal with...

Headings: Scamming Drivers Ola
Content: Scamming Drivers OlaOla had an offer for drivers. Work 60 hours for £1200. I Met this criteria but Ola hasn’t made my payment they put my payment under check and when I speak to them they are telling me some of the trips taken are very short journeys and it’s fraudulent. I am now without a weeks money, I have a family to provide for my cars rents overdue. I have called them around 50 times since Wednesday 12th and emailed them over 20 times. I used the portal on their app To call them they have no clue what so ever and today visited them in person and got nowhere. Tomorrow I am going to write to TFL and also take them to Claims Court and I’m getting one of my family member to Help me report them to the local newspapers as scammers. Plus I’ve have other drivers to back me up as they are doing this to a lot of driver. Scammers

Headings: The worst experience with Ola
Content: I joined the Ola super ultimate package and was offered £1000 guaranteed earnings with no comission upto 6 weeks. After the first week they changed my plan without notifying me or explaining anything to me..I called their customer service and they didn’t know what was happening in the UK as they’re all sitting in India and cant help you with anything. They’re now telling me to go to their office and talk to them about this issue. It was the worst working with them as they don’t even know what they’re talking about and can’t help you. It was the worst experience working with Ola.

Headings: What a disgrace of a company
Content: What a disgrace of a company, mayor of London and tfl need to look into this company, I worked 60 long hrs last week, and they are yet to pay me remainder of my wages, which is over £760, they are yet to even call me and give me a explanation.What a horrible experience I have had with them, the customer support in India, cant help with anything. zero stars.

Headings: Sub zero grades
Content: If there was a way of putting a lower star I would have. Patronising, unprofessional, and somewhat disturbing on personal level. The taxi hailing app claims they are different, well they are, they the worst of all. I tried signing as a driver and guess what the assessments all have these patronising demonising and more often trying to make you feel like less of a kind and sub version of human. Putting questions like how I should pick bags and try and listen to every demand. The assessments are more like how drivers should be always on command of the riders because they pay 4 pounds for a journey. On top they continue to patronise by giving examples of how women are weak and we should do out of our way to help women because they are weaker breed. App support is very irresponsible and have no basic knowledge. I am tested for my English by a test that is American based and judged by someone from India who on the phone doesn’t even understand southeast British accent or local dialect. They need personal training, local knowledge, gender equality and business ethics and most definitely need IT support big time. Good luck surviving London

Headings: I used Ola for the first time today
Content: I used Ola for the first time today. They advertised the £15 voucher, it us not true. I booked Ola today from sane destinations (return) and were charged £7.56 for the first pick and £11.33 for the return. Same addresses for both rides. I will never use Ola sgain, decided to uninstall the app and will delete my account. They are not clear/accurate on their charges, plus,  I got charged £1 ectra just I because I'm in London. Will stick to Uber, at least I know the costs and other options before I confirm my booking.Ola! Adios!

Headings: Ola is so frustrating
Content: Ola is so frustrating. I took a ride somewhere and when I went to book a ride home it wouldn't let me, saying that I owed 9 pounds for the last ride and had to pay it first. When I tried to pay it gave me an error message saying that the service was unavailable. I. Checked my bank account and it had plenty of money in it. I took an Uber home and messaged Ola support. They have called me twice and walked me through the steps they said would clear the amount owed. Instead of clearing it, Ola Help charged my bank account twice and still shows me owing them 9 pounds. Headings: Worst experience with ola customer…

Headings: I took my first Orla ride yesterday. I was charged almost double the estimate
Content: I took my first Orla ride yesterday. The app estimated that the journey would be 9 to £11This was the invoiceBase Fare£2.5Distance Fare for 9.07 mile£11.34Ride Time Fare for 31 min£4.65Ride Fare£18.49And then there was a £1 central London surcharge on top, charged separately.I did complain, and they phoned, but they waffled about how it was perfectly standard, and that I must’ve change the route, because the driver chose to use Waze rather than Google Maps. They couldn’t explain why I had a distance fare and a ride  time fare. I ended up hanging up in frustration.I won’t be using them again

Headings: unsafe
Content: I am going to file a complaint against ola as when i called initially you guys promised that i will get my belongings back . for next 3 days nobody took any response to call driver or either me and when i called your agent was somehow able to get in touch with the driver and driver ended up saying that he called us the same day and informed us that there was nothing left in the cab which was  a total lie because the moment we came out of cab within just 2 minutes from when the cab left we called driver however he didn't respond i called him several times and then he blocked my number then my friend who was with me he also called driver several time and he blocked him too then i did saved his number and send him msgs on whats app he did't respond even after reading.Your agent ended up saying that if driver is denying there is nothing you could do. What if it would have been a case of rape , kidnap or any other physical violence will you still listen to your drivers.I seriously will never ever book cab with ola as i do not feel safe any more and i will make sure to that i share this incident as much as i can so the people could think several times before booking any cab with you .My belongings were a gifts from my friends on my birthday that doesn't matter how much they cost however for me it was worth millions. and on other hand there was a Casio G shock watch was there in packet and gift package which i am not sure what was in there and a basket with full of beverages and eatables.The way your agent clearly denied to take any responsibly this shows what kind of customer service you offer and i am sure if somebody would be raped or either kidnapped this is how your response would be.Any crime is a crime no matter whether its rape or stealing .i am attaching the screenshot of the FIR which i made at the same time as per your first agent suggestion and the screenshot of the whats app msgs.RegardsRajat chhabra

Headings: Unfair charge ( CRN 4648415947)
Content: I had just one experience with Ola and have felt it’s enough. I used it’s app to book a ride at Auckland domestic airport. I couldn’t find the driver and he couldn’t find me. I called a couple of times, but it’s a landline and no one picked up the phone.. No mobile available to contact the driver and he didn’t bother to give me a call. The service was cancelled by the driver, but I had to be charged of the cancellation fee. Nowhere on the web or the app to ask for a refund. The policy is if the service is cancelled either by you within a minute after booking or by the driver if he can’t find you in five minutes, you have to pay $10. It’s really unfair and annoying because I took initiative to solve the problem, but the driver didn’t, however, i was charged for their problem. The service was bad and I have deleted their app, I prefer to pay more for a better service rather than paying less for a terrible service, needless to say paying for no service at all. Josie

Headings: Dont drive with ola guys
Content: Dont drive with ola guys They are useless peopleOne customer vomit inside my car And then they paid nothing

Headings: Worst service
Content: Worst service, they charged twice for the single ride, No proper response it's been more than one month and I didn't get my money backIf we didn't pay the ola postpaid balance they are charging 1 rupee per day and for us they are not giving our money back

Headings: AVOID AVOID AVOID!!!
Content: I’ve used Ola many a time, often with terrible service but they were always a fair bit cheaper than Uber with their constant discount codes in the app itself. I had such terrible service with them on one occasion I vowed never to use them again, when my driver was a complete lunatic and I felt really unsafe, particularly when we drove straight through a red light at a major junction. Customer services didn’t care but said I should’ve called them via the app’s ‘emergency’ button...as if you’re going to vocally say on the phone whilst in the car that they’re a terrible driver! I just got our early and walked to my destination. However, last night whilst I was having issues with my Uber app connection and had to get to a meeting, I ordered an Ola. It turns out their customer services don’t seem to care when one of their drivers is involved in a collision either, even with a passenger on board. I told them it wasn’t my driver’s fault, but they still said they would ‘educate the driver on safe driving practices’ and when I informed them I have a recording of the third party admitting to driving too fast, they said they’d email me to get a copy, but never did. They were more interested in whether I was going to sue them. As the meter had been running for the whole time that the drivers switched details and they argued for a bit due to the third party being slightly aggressive, I asked for a refund of my ride. £2.97 they offered me...to take the price to their minimum fare. Despite the fact I missed my meeting entirely, and was rather shaken up, they said there wasn’t anything more they could do because “I had completed the ride”!!! The app is being deleted and this time I am certainly never using them again! Avoid avoid avoid!!!N.B. According to the drivers themselves, Ola’s driver or ‘partner me service is also terrible so the company is making money from us without providing a good service either to the customers OR the drivers!! Why would we support that?!

Headings: I've started taking Ola a lot now in…
Content: I've started taking Ola a lot now in the Bristol area. They're usually cheaper than Uber and rarely have price multipliers. Their customer service is basic. There's no in-app messaging like Uber but if you email them, they usually respond quickly. I had a driver cancel my ride mid-trip and they refunded me the day after I contacted them. Improvements:* Standardise vehicle quality - some drivers have awful cars* More drivers / quicker pick ups* Offer frequent user discounts

Headings: Stay away from OLA cab
Content: Yesterday I had a ride with OLA cab in North India from Gwalior to Bharatpur (150 km). The fare was 1200 INR above the estimated fare, because the driver charged 40 km more than he drove. I informed OLA cab about the incorrect billing by email, but they didn’t even send me a notice of arrival. Usually I book my transfers in India with trustable local taxi agencies or I asked the hotel to pick me up or to bring me to the airport. These transfers were always in time with trustworthy drivers and fair prices. I will stay away from OLA cabs in the future!

Content: Dirty C***ts can’t stop talking from their behind!!! Terrible support one lie after another

Headings: Awful customer service
Content: I took Ola ride to my home on 2 of Jan. As soon as I recognized that my house key has been left in the car, I did contact Ola through all channels asking them to contact Ola driver(name and CRN of the driver given). However, it has been 3 days waiting for them to contact the driver. Actually, I believe that the driver should provide the trusted phone number. Trusted number means Ola can contact the driver anytime when any issue occurred. I do not understand how the driver can ignore the call from Ola.  As mentioned earlier, this is such a urgent and serious situation and I am the customer so Ola should assist me more to reach the driver asap. Now I feel taking ride with Ola is unsafe because when something unexpected happens, it seems Ola can assist nothing. What Ola did is to ask me to be patient, that’s why I have been waiting for three days since I first contacted to Ola. However, I got nothing from the driver. Again, I choose to take a ride with Ola because I think Ola is such a big platform which can contact and control the drivers. If today I got nothing back from Ola or if I cannot get the key back, I will stop using Ola for life and I want to share this matter to others explaining that Ola cannot have a real assisting to their customer. For my issue, spending 3 days trying to contact the driver, I cannot imagine if something worst happens to the customer while taking the ride with Ola, what you can do for your customer? I definitely say that you can do nothing, just only asking the customer wait. What I ask Ola is just contact the driver because I am sure that my key is in the car. I DO Disappoint with this service.

Headings: Dont waste your money or time
Content: Ordered a taxi for the first time from the app in UK. Waited for a long time before calling the driver to find out where he was. He told me he was outside but after further questioning found out he went to the WRONG location. He could barely speakEnglish which made it hard to communicate and then he hung up on me. He then cancelled my ride and I got charged £4, leaving me stranded and vulnerable on a busy friday night and I'm heavily  pregnant as well! This will definitely be the last time I'm using this company, should have just stuck to Uber who is reliable and communicates with their customers. NEVER AGAIN!

Headings: Today I had booked a share cab from…
Content: Today I had booked a share cab from E-city phase-II to Ramamurthy Nagar. My Co passenger had to travel to Bannerghatta. The two drop locations were in the opposite direction. Because of that, I had to travel across bangalore unnecessarily for a extra 1h 15 minutes. Who will compensate for Mr lost time?  I could'not reach my destination in the right time. The whole purpose of Leaving the office ealy to complete my task is defeated. Who will compensate for my wasted resources? OLA customer service executives are not at all helpful to either resolve th issueor to compensate for the lost time, money, peace of mind. Ideally Ola customer care personnel said that they will send a link, where in which I get some Ola coupon for compensation for today'sride. In the link which has been shared, there is no provision to share the customer feedback. Today's my ride allotment was genuinely Ola's mistake, which they are not ready to accept. If Ola has any concern about customer satisfaction, they have to do the needful.

Headings: Drivers demanding additional payment
Content: Have used Ola in the UK for 5 trips, but had problems with drivers demanding extra cash at the end of the journey, on top of what is charged to card. In fact, the second problem one cancelled the job during the journey, incurring a £4 cancellation fee, and then tried to charge approximately twice the quoted price once we reached the destination. Needless to say, we will not be using Ola again and will be sticking with Uber!

Content: Bighest rip off ever. booked an ola to go to work and driver accepted the ride then phones me to ask where im going . I told him and he shut the phone and cancelled my ride which would of been $20 . Then whilst they tried to find me an other ola they put the price up to $50 for the same journey . Headings: Ola is hopeless has I driver in 20…

Headings: Don’t get caught by the 50% off deal…
Content: Don’t get caught by the 50% off deal fir joining. When you actually use ola it suddenly tells you (not evident when you first get the offer) that it’s max $10 off per ride. I actually got $5 off a $43 ride! So NOTHING TO DO WITH 50%.

Headings: SCAM ARTIST DRIVERS AND NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!
Content: I’m so disappointed with Ola’s scam artist drivers and the companies customer service. Than again, what customer service?? It’s non existent!I had a very bad experience with two dodgy drivers on the same day. I went to Melbourne for holiday and ordered an Ola from the airport to the closest train station for me and my Dad. I get a call from the driver asking me what my destination is and when I told him over the phone he cancels my ride!! So unprofessional and he shouldn’t have called to ask where I was going. I get another driver and upon hearing that me and my Dad are new to Melbourne he tells us that it would be much cheaper for us to change my ride til the final destination which is South Yarra and that it would only cost $35. I felt very hesitant to change my destination but he convinced me it wouldn’t be more than $40 max. I changed my destination but the estimated ride price didn’t show up!!! What a ridiculous app!! So I called customer service to find out an estimated price for my ride and they told me they can’t tell me over the phone and the driver kept saying ‘Don’t worry! It’s no more than $35. I just dropped off a rider to South Yarra and it cost him $35. If you get public transport for you and your Dad you’ll end up paying $40 anyway. It’s cheaper to get an Ola.’ Boy what a lie that was! When I reached my destination and the ride cost showed up it was almost $85!!!!Thing’s only got worse. I’ve opened up a dispute about the matter and only got a missed call from them at 12:45am when I was asleep!!! No other response since. I emailed customer service 3 times, and still no reply! It’s been 2 weeks!!! I’ve even called up customer service and was told somebody will get back to me but nobody has called me back since! I want a FULL REFUND this is bs!!! Never using Ola again I’m going to stick to Uber. They have much better customer service and solve issues immediately.

Headings: Driver in Bristol kept my phone which I…
Content: Driver in Bristol kept my phone which I accidentally left behind in his cab. He switched off the phone so I can’t track it and now he’s denying all knowledge and there’s nothing I can do.  Will never use again!

Headings: $46 for an Ola for 20 min drive
Content: I booked an Ola at 7pm Sat night. Yes it said i had to pay a premium rate but i discovered at the end of a 20 minute drive it cost me $46.00 (and that's with a 20% discount). Otherwise it would have cost $57.50. Beware of this shameful company.

Headings: Im sorry
Content: Im sorry, but I booked an Ola for a first time pick up at 9 Robinson St Shorncliffe Qld at 05.30pm and after 5 minutes of waiting in which the driver did not move from his location which was 5 minutes away. He decided to cancel the job which was from 9 Robinson St Shorncliffe to 712 Sandgate Rd Clayfield. If I am to be charged for this cancellation, this will be the first and last time I use Ola and shall pass this on to my friends. VERY EMBARRASSING FOR YOIUR COMPANY, is all I can say.Chris Henry

Headings: Ola cab driver was driving very badly…
Content: Ola cab driver was driving very badly and take speedy cut that I was hit by a carbadly I requested to Ola call my no. Number speedily 7073857553

Content: I understand now why their are so many unhappy customers because the service sucks. Being a Ola driver for over a year now having so many issues every now and then. When I upload documents after it's expired they keep declining it without any comms. Called them multiple times was told it's a different team looking after it. I urge the executive to look into these reviews and make some change for a better service. There is a saying "You pay peanuts, you get Monkeys.

Headings: Dont use OLA
Content: Dont use OLA Stay away. They just deduct what they want from your account. Got multiple times charged twice. Support is useless they just keep repeating same phrases. Its like talking with a wall. App is lowest level nothing wors properly. Pay the few cents extra and have no trouble.

Headings: Bad ratings system
Content: Bad ratings system, unfair and too complicated. UBER rating system is better

Headings: Inexperienced driver got lost driving…
Content: Inexperienced driver got lost driving us to the airport in Melbourne, Australia. We were visitors and had to use our phones/apps to get us to the airport. The bill was $30 more than what was quoted in the app, and the driver said he would adjust but I should also contact Ola. Did as directed and received no response. I have subsequently tried to contact Ola over multiple days and using multiple methods.  Nothing has happened and they will NOT respond. Even tried to use their contact info related to safety concerns and was NOT able to get thru. Highly recommend that you Do NOT use this service.

Headings: Just do not use them
Content: Just do not use themThey couldn't find me. They rang and said l was on the wrong street. Driver then hung up so l cancelled Still charged a cancellation fee

Headings: I will never use Ola again
Content: I will never use Ola again. I have deleted Ola apps although I still have 2 x 20dollar introduction bonus.No way the driver will pick you up if a discount coupon is activated. You will end up paying 10dollar cancellation fee.Crap. Didi is much better.

Headings: One star only because I couldn't give…
Content: One star only because I couldn't give less. Drivers  (most of them ) can't find my address. Expanding their maps to get detail seems difficult. Most get lost one street over. My second to last trip, the driver needed to call me for directions. Actually, she called to tell me she had arrived. She hadn't. I gave directions over the phone, street by street until she got to me. I got into the car and , somehow, she cancelled the trip which saw me charged $7.70. The driver then asked me if I could pay cash for the trip. I only had a little over $22. The driver then called Ola for help. Hmm, nope, I had to get out and call for another driver. And contact Ola to TRY and get a refund. If I wasn't in a different state and my premmy grand daughters not in NICU I doubt I would ever use this service again. PS just received a refund, but no apology or discussion on the driver behavior.  Poor result.

Headings: Third class application i have ever…
Content: Third class application i have ever seen.Customer care doesn't respond.They give employment uneducated people who doesn't know how to use it.Cheaters.

Headings: Rude, Aggressive Drivers!
Content: Arrived at Sydney Airport 25/11, used Ola Cabs, this is the second time I used them but NEVER EVER again! I thought first time might be just the individual driver himself and it was just my luck to have such a rude, aggressive driver but after yesterday, I tell myself NO WAY will I use Ola Cabs again. I was on a business trip from Melbourne and was going to a client meeting at a business centre. When I keyed in the name of the Business Centre, it came up on the Ola Map. When the Driver picked me up, he could not find the street number but he did not ask me and just ask me to get down on Ricketty St. I asked him is this the street number he said NO! you did not put any street number on the address so I just drop you off anywhere on Ricketty St! OMG! What kind of person is this! I then said you could have asked me instead of asking me to get off in the middle of nowhere. He then got off the car and grab my luggage from the boot and kicked me out of the car!!! This was the worst cab experience I ever had in my life and I am 55! I tried to call Ola Cab but there was no number, I wrote a complaint and until 3 days now, no one responded! Later on, I took an Uber, and the Uber driver told me Ola Cab was an Indian company from India and he refused to join them as this company is very unprofessional and support is non-existent. No wonder!

Headings: Stay away from Ola outstations.
Content: Stay away from Ola outstations.Their drivers try to charge more by taking the longest possible route if call them on their bad practices then they make excuses or don't listen to you.  Plus their price estimations are an absolute scam. Booked a round trip cab to UP from Delhi prices estimation showed 3900+ taxes, the driver they sent was overall okay but would regularly change routes to cover more km. so they can charge more. on the way back their app got stuck and didn't show our return trip or the route to return trip. we called the help and they said they can't do much about it and we should use google maps.We got lost in a rural area on dirt roads once on the way back as the driver didn't know the way either, it was a huge Security concern as my parents were with me. Then their driver started saying sir CNG kam h detour lena pdega CNG ke liye and all, which added even more distance to our trip. In the end, we reached Delhi the app showed that we owed 6090 … plus taxes of 500 .. almost double the original amount. with a distance of over 180 km more than expected. I had to argue for an hour with the driver and with ola customer service to resolve to issue, they agreed only because their app was at fault and it was a security hazard coz we got lost on the way back  In an unknown area soo I said would seek legal options as I had the proof. Finally, I only paid the original estimated fee, because of their technical fault and poorly informed driver we could have gotten lost or had some other securities issue during our return trip. their Drivers on outstations service also try to take longer routes and rake as much km as possible so they can increase the trip distance. They converted our 300km round trip to a 480 km trip. because of the CNG debacle and saying that this the fastest route. later their app went dead and the driver misguided us even more. SO Final review STAY AWAY from their outstations service.

Headings: Driver cancelled my booking but i was…
Content: Driver cancelled my booking but i was still charged for it , no customer service contact number , this is fraud

Headings: Me and wife had a terrible ride ever…
Content: Me and wife had a terrible ride ever yesterday night!!!I was in Bangalore airport my destination was koramanagala, when I was gonna book a cap from OLA zone, One Ola driver came and ask me if I wanted a ride and I said yes as I was in hurry , he didn't even let me book, He took my luggage and put it in the car, a moment later he gave me his phone to set my destination so I did .. And damn he took very long route twice longer than usual! Fare came up to 2171rupees, before he show me the fare.. he told me to write my name and phone no. Even my signature! What the Fug does it mean??, with that fare I go roundtrip I promise.. I travel every after 2months .. The fare is always 1000-1300max but this time it was something I didn't expected!!! I couldnt get his car number or name as I didn't book the cap!

Headings: use once but not again
Content: I’ve used this company so many times when I first heard about them and they were great but I’ve noticed as more you use them the service becomes terrible, drivers cancel taxis because ether don’t want to wait in a 5 minute line. Discounts become less and less. I honestly loved this service at first so If you have never used them before please do but don’t become a loyal customer because they’re not loyal to you. Amateur drivers and bad service. I got charged £4.00 for a driver who picked up different people and there was no customer service number to call to rectify this. I lost money for someone else to have a free ride and still chose to use them but tonight I waited 8 minutes for a taxi to drive past me and then cancel because there was small traffic, when I was shouting to the car I was there ! am now on a train which I have a pass for. Would’ve preferred to give me money to ola but they clearly didn’t want it.

Headings: I'd rather walk 3 miles through 2 feet of snow.
Content: If I could give 0 stars I would. Last night I ordered an ola, as he arrived I called him because I couldn't find him at the pick up point turns out he decided to pick up some girls who happened to be at the same location. So they got a free ride home on my card, if you're reading this you're welcome. This basically means he didn't ask for a name or confirm the destination which should be pretty standard but, I guess not. Also after all this I couldn't order another ola from the same pick up point until the driver finished the original trip (you're welcome girls). Viva la Uber

Headings: Cheap rides as long as it lasts
Content: Cheap rides as long as it lasts, but utterly useless for long term.Once the app malfunctioned so I could not book any rides, and I could see the last drivers location 24/7. The driver couldn't see this, neither did customer service, and they had no idea how to fix the situation.Eventually I had a fee that didn't get cleared, and after that I haven't been able to use Ola ever again. I sent tickets to fix this, and these got autoreplies from their automated customer service. I replied with variants of  "Please fix this" 50 times, and got to see most of their automated replies that are made to look like human replies.

Headings: They rip you off
Content: They rip you off! will not use them ever again! Double charged $86 and no way to contact them.

Headings: The most horrible taxi service  is Ola
Content: The most horrible taxi service  is Ola! Whenever i need a cab from a particular destination, only those cabs are available that have a higher rate.this is deliberate.Most of the time,there are no cabs.Most disgusting service.

Headings: Worst experience ola driver misbehaved
Content: Friends I booked an auto today and the driver denied to pick us and he cancelled the ride and charged me Rs 15 later we  another ride and the same thing happened with the charges .the driver misbehaved very badly .I am planning to take this to the consumer forum for cheating the citizens under the name ola cabs .I have all proof in hand .if you all agree to this .we have a consumer complaint forum online which will give you faster remedy . Let us show our reaction to these cheaters

Headings: Again faced the same problem with OLA…
Content: Again faced the same problem with OLA booked, Ola minicab , when I book a trip it was showing 7 minutes wait. After booking, it starting showing 5 minutes then 10, 15, 20, 30 minutes. Check these screenshots.When I contacted the driver, he said it will take around 1 hour, Because he already has a passenger. I said that Why you pick then trip when you already have passenger . He said, "Hum se jo bola jata hai hum waise hi kaam karte hai"( We work on same which order by company).When I canceled the booking , they showing that Cancel booking charges INR 50.Very horrible, Nobody can't wait for 30, 40 minutes or 1 hour. Going to delete OLA app.

Headings: Waste of time and effort
Content: I’ve tried several times to book a cab using the app. It finds both addresses (not always) but then says that it cannot use the drop off point so I need to change it. Genius! Have deleted the app. Complete waste of time

Headings: I would have given -1 for the…
Content: I would have given -1 for the unprofessional behaviour of ola staff and customer executive. They are cheat and not at all supportive.

Headings: Never ever recharge your Ola wallet..It…
Content: Never ever recharge your Ola wallet..It happened  in my case twice the driver cancelled the ride and they deducted the amount from my wallet as cancellation  fees .Why should I be penalised when the driver is at fault There's no professionalism  in their services .They should have a mechanism where driver can not cancel the ride when it is confirmed..

Headings: Be careful with Ola Outstation rides as…
Content: Be careful with Ola Outstation rides as they are charging extra distance fare from Pune to Mumbai only. I guess this a deal with Drivers and Ola management itself because distance from Nilje Gaon to Pune Wadgaon sheri is 145 Km's but they charged me extra distance almost 30 Km's as the min distance is 160 KM  by default. Until and unless you check the fare breakup you dont know what the exact reason why you are charged more.If you report this to call centre they are refunding the amount but if you forget to check the fare break-up then you are fooled.Looks like this is a strategy from Ola to keep it's drivers intact.

Headings: OLA $20 Credit / Voucher
Content: OLA offered me a $20 voucher for referring a friend or colleague.I received the credit and $20 was applied to my account, however when I tried to use it the app stated that all drivers were busy yet my friends and partner traveling with me were all able to book an OLA.Clearly OLA does not want me to redeem the credit they offered to me. I am very disappointed.

Headings: Awful driving. Theft of extra money from my account.
Content: First time user of OLA and became the last time.The driver drove too fast and wrecklessly. I had to hold on to the inner door handle so as not to slide to the other side when turning.The fare was paid for at the time however days later they have taken $9 from my account for no reason and without consent therefore theft. There is no-one to speak to about this as they don't give you that option. I've tried online to get help and nothing. I DO NOT recommend using OLA!

Headings: I booked an Ola and asked the driver to…
Content: I booked an Ola and asked the driver to take my daughter (who I had had an argument with) to my 90 year old mothers house which was 21km away. She had some luggage so I gave him $15 extra cash and asked him to take her directly there and if he could drop her luggage at my mothers from door. There fare was suppose to be $22 - $26. I was charged $36 and he dropped the luggage on the road about 50 meters away from my mothers door. With the $15 tip and $36 it was a con. I will never use Ola again.LikeShareMore

Headings: Absolutely disgraceful
Content: Absolutely disgraceful, the service was clearly not of Australian standard. The fluctuation of time was met with declined calls all to result in an 8 dollar fee to cancel, in short it’s a complete scam and Tracey Grimshore my auntie will be addressing this issue on a current affair at a later time . The guy who caused such turmoil in my nights evening is O J Ajibola number plate- 721RRV

Headings: Lack of customer service
Content: There is absolutely no way to contact Ola and discuss an issue!!! If you have a problem it's this or this but what if it's neither?!?!? These stupid articles in the support center do NOT HELP AT ALL. I have referred friends and then I don't get anything back as promised and as my notification says. And let me just mention the fact that there's no stupid bell on the home screen especially for iOS phones, so all of these explanations of pressing the bell button are automatically excluded. Therefore I would never receive my bonus by refering friends and soon or later I would never choose this app again if there is no adequate customer service to answer questions. Unbelievable! Even the smallest and newest businesses have any sort of customer service, trying to enter such a big market in such a doggy and cheap way wouldn't lead anywhere but costing more and losing so much more by providing a really bad service. You cannot make something and expect it's gonna work and maintain itself And grow with no extra effort or even a penny. Please be realistic and launch only when it's ready to be used.

Headings: As an OLA driver
Content: As an OLA driver, i can assure the riders that the  app is as bad for us as it is for you.  i have calculated over the last month that 90% of rides are cancelled as soon as i accepr them.   Do yourselves a favour and stick with Uber or DIDi. The app has given me jobs that are 45 kilometers away.

Headings: Ola drivers continually cancel rides a few minutes out
Content: Have had three different days where drivers cancel when they are under 3 mins away (this is after I had already waited 10 mins). In Melbourne Cup day last week this happened THREE times. I was then 45 minutes late for the event I was meant to be at. Surprise Surprise there is no way to contact Ola to complain about this disgraceful service. I used to tell everyone to use Ola, not anymore!  At least taxis turn up!

Headings: I had one fare total amount of 42$.
Content: I had one fare total amount of 42$.. cancelled two fares on the same day cause both drives had no idea where they were going when waiting for pick...my account has been charged almost 200$ pre authorisation fee..this is ridiculous. Do not use.i will be in contact with my bank and if money is not returned i will be reporting ola..definitely deactivating app

Content: Not good on part of OLA.APP doesnt mention about toll tax in addition to fare. Driver tells you  on boarding.Secondly, worst thing. You are using one way but are forced to pay two way toll plaza ticket.Why?Customer will not prefer it second time.Should review on toll plaza return fee.

Headings: Zero stars

Content: Ola ‘s map is crap!!! Always take the longest route to reach the destination and claims to give discounts!!!! And the  wait sometimes is so frustrating. It’s disappointing

Content: If I could give no stars I would. Everytime I have used Ola they have cancelled on me. Terrible as service

Headings: Very deceptive advertising
Content: Very deceptive advertising. 50% off in first 2 weeks is only to a max of $10.  Looked everywhere for terms and conditions - none to be found so downloaded the app and only when you go to final stage of booking is this apparent.  Couldn't schedule driver so now urgently finding another way to airport.

Headings: Literally only reason I’m still using…
Content: Literally only reason I’m still using Ola is because they’re running offers cheaper than Uber. Drivers consistently cancel rides once accepted, they make you wait for more than one minute without moving so when you cancel, Ola charge you a £4 cancellation fee (But if you’ve waited longer then no refund after 5-10 minutes for a booked taxi and they cancel for no reason). 9/10 times you cannot contact the driver when you try as they’re always either on the phone to their friends or the app just tells you they aren’t booked. Drivers frequently accept you and then cancel if theres surging so you’re left with no cab and a higher fare when you rebook. Try and contact Ola support to feedback - good luck. Would take a doctors qualified person to figure out how to actually get in touch with them to tell them about their poor service.Bottom line - only use if you have no other option and don’t rely on them at all.

Headings: I wish I had seen the reviews earlier…
Content: I wish I had seen the reviews earlier but I needed a ride share app ASAP. I didn’t even take advantage of the “50%” off thing, I paid full price. Ola takes an estimated fare pre authorisation off your card then charges you so basically takes double the fare straight up then releases the pre authorisation amount days later. They tell you its released straight away but it definitely isnt and we ALL know banks take days to return these funds anyway - they should NOT be double charging. How ridiculous. The only answers you get from customer service are generic copy and paste answers. Definitely stick to Uber who have actually THOUGHT ABOUT how to run their business much better.

Headings: Worst experience ever
Content: Worst experience ever. Ride is never booked on time. Fares are always higher than normal.

You get hit with emails / notifications all the time (which at first seem helpful) however often the promotions simply don't work. The customer service is terrible, the people replying on twitter simply don't speak English that well (not a major problem for me, but communication was definitely an issue). There are plenty of other alternatives to Uber, use someone else. CQ.

Headings: Customer service is terrible & ap is useless
Content: The Ap is rubbish as not accurate at all,   Even the drivers say it is rubbish.   I started using Ola as it is cheaper and the drivers get a bigger percentage.  But the service is so poor I will not use them again.  I left me phone in the car and tried to contact customer service and the response was useless.  Not helpful at all and did not reply until I followed up a three times.  They kept asking me for information I already supplied and information which was already in their system.   Their first response was I should be contacting the drive not customer service,,,  I told them I would if I had my mobile.I will never use them again as the service is so so bad.  Stay away and pay the higher prices with uber.

Headings: greedy driver wont book ola again!

Headings: Awesome cab driver and service from Ola
Content: Hi, I would like to thank my Ola cab driver Iqbal Singh. I wanted to give him a five star rate on the app but somehow the app unfortunately did not provide me with the opportunity to do so. So I’m here to give feedback on the amazing service he had provided for me. He is a very friendly, cheerful and happy decent human being. I enjoyed our laughter and conversations to work. Thank you for the experience Ola Cabs & awesome driver Iqbal Singh. :)

Content: M disappointed by the services they charges us extra 400 rs on rental car unecessarily as we endd our ride before the given time n they have no idea abt this.Will never advice anyone to prefer ola cabs

Headings: Do not book with Ola! Not safe at all.
Content: Do not book with Ola. I have had numerous issues from over charging....going a blatantly wrong route to what is on the set nav...I even had a driver who decided to drive in the wrong lane with with oncoming traffic approaching! Latest was that I left my keys in a car, the driver explained he lived 2 minutes from me and would drop it off. Then made me pay £10 or I wouldn't get my keys back! Ola did nothing about it.  Please please please avoid this company, don't be tempted by the offers, its cheap for a reason. I wish I'd never signed up.

Headings: Unethical and unreliable
Content: Unethical and unreliable. I have sent a few e-mails to customer support regarding their over-charging. ( charges twice for rides more than one occasion) and all I get is back to back auto generated respond saying they couldn’t find my registered account which is absolutely frustrating and unresolved to this date. I even sent them a screenshot of my account page. Aside from that, thejr referral scheme is inconsistent. Just terrible borderline scammers!

Headings: Ola not up to speed yet - unreliable app and discounts not applied.
Content: I used Ola twice over the weekend. They have several discount offers running at the moment including a Fly Buys offer and 50% off rides. Unfortunately both times I used them the appropriate discount wasn’t applied. After making a complaint the first trip was discounted retroactively and I am still waiting for the second trip to be rectified. After speaking to the drivers and based on my own experiences I believe the Ola app is not up to spec and prone to errors. I will be reverting back to Uber from now on.

Headings: Driver never came

Content: I would suggest Never book Ola in NZ. It is the worst cab service I’ve ever seen in my life. There is no option for 0 Star. So, I had to give 1.

Content: If a 0 star review was available, I would choose it.AVOID this company like the plague. Their “estimated” fare may look appealing at face value, however when they drop you off you will charged an “updated” fare which is based on a number of “varying” factors. All of which is in their terms and conditions. I find it amusing that customer support/service is almost non-existant, and if you check their flashy “values” part of their website, its no suprise the false caring jargon doesn’t list their customers as one of their values. Horrible business model / con artists.

Headings: Why launch when you have no cars to…
Content: Why launch when you have no cars to actually take tripsDeleted app Coventry

Headings: Ola NZ - your service is not ready for rollout
Content: Ola NZ: so bad. Used it twice, first driver followed Ola’s GPS directions and got lost while I waited in the cold. She finally found me and asked me how to get to the destination as she couldn’t trust Ola’s directions. Next trip, same thing. I watched in the app as the driver was sent around a block 2-3 times before finding his way to me. Then the app wouldn’t start for him, so we sat in his car for another 5 mins. But best of all this trip is still running in the app, 4 days later! I can’t book another and I guess I’m waiting for them to finish the trip and charge me my life savings in return for this spectacularly bad experience. Tried calling support; no answer. Tried emailing, they stopped replying. Just avoid them. Every driver (who is also an Uber driver BTW) says Ola is problematic. Oh, and Ola has a 6.2B valuation!? Come on now. You’re supposed to do stuff well if you want to be a valuable company.

Headings: Tried to use them 4 times and failed 3
Content: Tried to use them 4 times and failed 3. They blamed my bank for the problem but my bank confirmed they presented once. Contacting them was a waste of time. They closed my complaint as resolved when it wasn't.

Headings: Charge changed after paying for trip!
Content: Took a short ride. It was $8 and was charged $4 to my credit card. Left a 5 star review.I now look at my account and the same trip has changed to $50, still showing $4 paid but with $46 owing! I have complained but they refuse to even look at it! Worse customer service ever.

Headings: Absolutely a disgrace of a company
Content: Absolutely a disgrace of a company. You book. They then take your money immediately based on quoted price. This stays pending and charged in your bank account. Any additional fees such as time and traffic you are then charged and it’s usually massive. This also stays as a pending charged transaction. With in 2 days they then deduct full fee from your bank and LEAVE the pending charges. It’s apparently NOT their policy to contact your bank. You need to wait the 14 days for your bank to then release those pending charges. So if you don’t mind being charged twice and more than quoted than go ahead and use it. Ola make up toll charges and additional fees. So disgusting never use again. They have zero customer help. And zero policies on return methods.

Headings: Went to go to  Fleetwood Mac with my…
Content: Went to go to  Fleetwood Mac with my son there was nobody in the area to pick us up  so we use the Uber app and it was someone with in three minutes  after the concert we tried to use it again and was cancelled on my three drivers after that we use the Uber app was picked up within three minutes what a crap service Ola

Headings: Ola NZ sucks
Content: Ola NZ sucks. The worst car service I have ever used. I would award it zero stars but you have to rate it Bad its below bad.Took a Ola car from Auckland Domestic to Remuera. I was quoted $36-39 with the $10 off for new customers it sounded good.Not so the driver wouldn't take my directions. I said why are you going into the city? He said the GPS knows to fastest way. I figured so what I'm paying $39 with a $10 discount he can waste his gas.Not the case I guess they charge by the KM. I got out of the car POed with the driver. He took off pretty quick before the bill reached my phone. $55. He probably thought affluent area the guy won't notice or care. I emailed the company got a reply and a refund but only $15 which made my bill $40 no new customer discount. After the lying and cheating the ride should have been for free to teach the driver its not cool to rob your customers.It was my first and last time using this company Uber is far superior

Headings: Got charged a £2.50 wait fee when I was…
Content: Got charged a £2.50 wait fee when I was standing there when the cab arrived. Tried to contact customer support to get a refund (which Uber does really well) only be told the maximum time for the request had timed out less that 20 mins after I got out of the cab. No other way to contact Ola. Absolutely ridiculous. Back to Uber for me.

Headings: Faulty Ola App
Content: I had the Ola app installed but it has a problem.  The app would open when I wasn't using my phone and book a trip that I had no idea about.  I would be alerted by phone calls.  When I cancelled the faulty unwanted trip I was charged a $10.00 cancellation charge.  I have since uninstalled the app as the app has randomly started up and booked a ride without any input from me 3 times and I keep getting charged the cancellation fee. This fault in the app has destroyed the whole experience.

Headings: Ola NZ...Rides cancelled by driver...unacceptable
Content: I have used Ola 6 times over the past 3 months.The app works ok..basically a copy of Uber.I have now had 3 times when the driver accepted the ride and then cancelled within a 5-10 minutes. Each time I got an Uber ride straight away.I find Ola's policy completely unacceptable.If I have contracted with a driver they should provide the service unless there is an emergency.I will not be using Ola any more.

Headings: Today I waited in the rain for twenty…
Content: Today I waited in the rain for twenty minutes for the ola cab I had ordered. I was cold, wet and running late. The app indicating his location kept fluctuating between 8min and 13min distance from me and then he cancelled after me waiting for him , but it’s funny if it was the other way round we would get charged

Headings: Overcharged, terrible customer service
Content: I was told about ola since I am having issues getting uber to workI used the coupon and was quote about £7, after several minutes the driver cancelled for no apparent reason, kept trying but the price kept jumping all over the place, even with the coupon jumped up to £17 at one point, eventually I got a quote of around £10, so I took it.Drive was fine but afterwards, saw I had been charged over £16.I can even see a fare increase on the invoice for £6.08 No reasons given at all, so I contacted ola and they reached out to the driver and this is the response I got"Hi Craig,Thank you for contacting Ola. We understand your concern regarding the charges applied for the ride bearing CRN 3591791821. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you. We assure you that our billing team had re-checked the bill amount, and we would like to inform you that we always advise our drivers to take the optimal route to the destination as suggested by Google navigation. After validating your route, we observed that the driver followed the optimal route and you have been charged appropriately.We appreciate your understanding in this regard"Really, not going to actually address the issue of the overcharging. If I can't get a refund then I will do my best to leave bad reviews and post on social media so they lose money in the long run.If they can seemingly add an extra charge they can do this to everyone, but I am sure if they do it will end up in people never using them again, I know I won't be

Headings: false Advertising
Content: I signed up because Ola advertised 1. 100 flybuys points. 2. 50% off rides up to $10 for 2 weeks. I got neither. I was given an estimate of $8 to the airport. Charged $16! Double! It included a $3 charge for parking when there was no parking. The driver didn’t even get out his seat to unload bags so definitely no parking for him, he remained in the drop off zone only. After frustrating blow offs from Facebook Ola, because there seems no other way to contact them, I received a $4 credit. Much prefer Uber. False advertising and the commerce commission should get in this before more people are ripped off large amounts.

Headings: Today I waited in the rain for twenty…
Content: Today I waited in the rain for twenty minutes for the ola cab I had ordered. I tried to call the driver twice to find out where he actually was. He did not answer. The recorded message said the number was disconnected!!! I was cold, wet and running late. The app indicating his location kept fluctuating between 8min and 13min distance from me. I  feel I was too patient!  The driver cancelled!!!!!!!!! WHY???? I walked to my destination and had missed my appointment. I WILL NEVER CALL OLA AGAIN.

Headings: Absolutely terrible!!!
Content: Absolutely terrible! I used Ola for the first and only time yesterday. Was quoted $22 with discount. Was going to the airport and the driver missed a turn and we ended up on a 15 minute detour. Luckily I had left plenty of time to make my flight! I told the driver I did not want to pay for the extra distance and he assured me that the way the prices work is not based on km’s travelled but the distance from my house to the airport (lies). So then I got a bill of $42!! I told him I need a partial refund please and he kept arguing that the detour was only 3 minutes. More lies! He then went on to tell me I was the worst customer he’d ever had. He said he’d pay me $10 out of his own pocket if I promised not to report it to Ola. Which I never ended up getting. Very rude, unprofessional and misleading! I will never use Ola again!

Headings: Way too much  add too  Annoying
Not recommended-Fraudulent
Content: Not recommended-FraudulentThey say 50% off for two weeks, but capped at a $10. When a ride is booked they deduct charges for bank authorisation and tell that it will be reverted back to your account, but this does not happen. Today, their app showed $6.5 is deducted but $7 have been deducted from my account. Also, I have not received 50% off.

Headings: Awful service!
Content: Awful service!! They said 50% off when you first sign up, but this was capped at a max of $10 and most of my trips into the city are $40-$60 each!! Then they provided a discount code of $10 off during NZ Fashion Week, and I tried twice to use it, and failed. It kept saying unable to use this code... terrible! And one of the rides who showed up was in another branded taxi car??

Headings: Fraudulent and Deceptive
Content: I used Ola for the first time last night.  The fare quoted was $25.  The driver dropped me off in the wrong location and I had to hail a taxi to get to where I wanted to go.  So I ended up paying double.  To make matters worse when I checked my credit card this morning Ola has charged me twice for two different amounts - both way above the $25 fare quoted!  Looking at the other reviews I think Ola is behaving in an unethical and deceptive manner.  Their claim that they are cheaper than Uber is clearly false advertising.  Also the fare quoted should be the fare paid - they should not be able to increase your fare once you have accepted the ride.  Last night was my first and last time using this company.  I will be sticking with Uber and Taxi Apps who are transparent about the fare before you accept the ride.

Headings: Blind-Sided by Cost Blowout!
Content: We tried Ola for the first time a week ago, when we had to travel from Croydon (Sydney's Inner West) to the Sydney Domestic Airport.No problem with the timing, driver or vehicle, but the cost was RIDICULOUS!.I've taken a taxi on the same route many, many times over the years, and the cost has varied from about $35 up to $50.When I typed our pickup point and destination in to the Ola App, a price of something a little over $30 popped up straight away. "WOW!" I thought. "These guys are amazing!!"However, as the vehicle (initially listed as being only 5 minutes away) got closer to our pick-up address, the stated cost as shown on my app increased to $40, and then, just as I was about to confirm the transaction to my cc, it suddenly jumped to well over $60!I confirmed, as the vehicle was arriving, and I didn't want to stuff the driver up, but I wasn't at all sure by then exactly HOW much I would end up paying, as the promo information stated I was entitled to a 50% discount for the first two weeks of Ola travel. I later looked at the fine print and saw that that 50% was limited to a mere $10.Whoop-dee-doo.I'm now back home from my trip, and have checked my cc statement. I was charged $62.05, but there was a separate, additional Ola charge on my statement (for the same day) of a further $5.09.So - total fare = $67.14What the....???!!!And the driver was happily telling us on the trip to the airport how much CHEAPER Ola was than either Uber OR a taxi service!I feel totally suckered by Ola, and will not be using them again.Incidentally, on our return to Sydney, we did exactly the same trip in reverse, back to Croydon by taxi, and it cost us $46.00.Say no more....

Headings: Not worthy
Content: Had my first experience with Ola today and I can honestly say I don't recommend it.  I arrived at the train station running low on battery and decided to order a taxi using Ola. First driver arrived after 5 minutes, not bad I thought but he managed to drive his wheel on the kerb and all I could hear was air coming out of his tyre so clearly I couldn't use his service. He asked me to cancel the taxi and order another one. I did that and for some reason the payment method was not valid anymore (I used the same card for the previous order so I don't know what happened there) I've tried to use another card and then had a message that the price increased. Never mind I thought and I tried to book it but it turned out there  were no drivers around. In a meantime message arrived that I've been charged cancellation fee for the first taxi. I was trying to sort it out and my phone run out of battery so in the end I had to take a black cup that costed me double the price.  Definitely not worth the hassle.

Headings: It's easy on cash before but
Content: It's easy on cash before butNot now but best option in ride

THEN all of a sudden, a new driver allocated and again 15 min goes by... There service stinks..  I wont be using them again!!!   Good luck Ola

Headings: Don't be fooled by their promise of…

When I queried this after not being informed of the surcharge before confirming the cab I got told I must have simply ignored the notification! Yes sure I did because I want to pay 4 times what it should normally cost to get home! After being spoke to so rudely the supervisor promised me he would look into it personally and get back to me within 48 hours - that was 4 days ago. Bad company, bad service DO NOT recommend - back to Uber it is!

Headings: Rs.2.8 Lakhs loss due to irresponsible driver.
Content: Hello Ola,I have raised number of tickets raising a serious concern but all the tickets have been closed without resolving it.Ticket numbers: 188770030 (Original ticket), 189054432, 189162519, 189896038, 189162519, 189054432, 188770030.I have incurred a lost close to 2.8 Lakhs loss due to irresponsible driver who cancelled my booking without any notice which made me and my family missing a flight from Chennai to London and that's the whole issue is all about.It's quite unfortunate that a company of this size doesn't have a good support system in place.  All the above tickets are closed without even resolving.I have taken this matter on twitter but no response yet.  This is what happens when a company of this size holds monopoly in its field which eventually looses its credibility by the de-graded or non-existing customer service .Does really OLA Support exists or help its customers?.

Ola Cab is going to shut down soon because of its poor service. Uber is quiet professional as compared to cheap Ola.

I phoned him and he said he was somewhere else when I asked for my location. Tried calling him two times and he wouldn’t answer the phone. Headings: Birmingham.
Content: Birmingham.. my daughter ordered one for me. Disgusting driver.. Big van turned up. I clambered up into it and try to shut the big sliding door.   Im trying to open window as late hot summer night.  Driver too busy talking on his mobile.  Im asking if opens and he says yes window opens and carries on talking on mobile.  Its late night so pitch black .. I spend 10 mins feeling around trying to open.  In end I say loudly “excuse me  I asked you 10 mins ago if opens”  he sarcastically says they dont  thats why I opened front ! Speaking to me In a sarcastic way.   I just tell him carry on talking on mobile.   Terrible service

Headings: Terrible!!!
Content: Terrible. Before you confirm booking, the app shows multiple cars in the area and tells you a car is 1 or 2 mins away (in my experience). Once you confirm and payment is authorised, the car was shown as 9 mins away. We were running late but chose to wait. We watched the GPS and the app showed the car going backwards and forwards in the same position for 8 minutes, but the estimated arrival stayed at 6 mins! 20 minutes after we ordered, we called the driver and he advised he was still 9 minutes away due to traffic! This was the second time ordering an Ola - the first experience was the same but we gave Ola the benefit of the doubt and tried again because of the 50% off for 2 weeks promotion.  Cancelled the Ola and reverted to Uber. The Uber app told us the car was 2mins away - and what do you know? We were picked up in 2 mins. We'll stick to Uber thanks, and will recommend everyone stay with Uber! Sorry Ola drivers who were pushing us to use Ola for the better commission rate for drivers.  Customer experience is key!!! The app does not accurately reflect ETA and is misleading. Uber is definitely a superior customer experience!

Headings: It’s happened too many times now

Headings: Thought I would give OLA a try, avoid at all costs!
Content: First time user of OLA, what a mistake.I booked ola, the driver drove past me and ended up 850m away from me, I rang and ask what he was doing and he told me he was outside sunbbq waiting for me. I told him the pickup address was at 402 Newcastle St Northbridge, as per what I entered. He again told me where he was waiting for me and that his GPS was correct and I was wrong.After about 4 minutes of explaining where I was and how to get to me, he said he was coming (all he had to drive was 850m west along Newcastle St to where I was). After waiting for 10 minutes, I tried calling him and I recieved a message that he could not be connected. I tried calling him 3 or 4 times more without success. Soon after I got a cancellation notice and charged a $10 cancellation fee.Apart from mgetting charged for somethng that was not my fault, the more upsetting part was that I had to deal with such a rude person who just cancelled and blocked my number.I tried contacting OLA and support is non-existant, every time I follow instructions as to what I need to do I receive a message that the server is down. I contacted UBER who came immediatley and got me to my function ontime no thanks to OLA.I have added a screenshot of the driver "WAJDI ALNAJJAR: White ix35) avoid him at all costs.

Headings: BE AWARE OF SCAMS WHILE DRIVING WITH…
Content: BE AWARE OF SCAMS WHILE DRIVING WITH OLA Not satisfied neither happy with Ola and I will never operate a ride share service through OLA. Since OLA has refused to pay me for the service that I have provided, there is not much else that I can do but to warn everyone else who is considering using OLA app.•	I had a rider who booked and I picked him up, advised me I will be his personal driver for the night.•	Went different locations with toll charges and drove for more than 10 hours around Brisbane and North side went through Clem 7 and most of the tolls around Logan area.•	My role as a Ride share driver partner is to drive clients from A to B. It is not my duty to track and record the movement of the vehicle from location A to B or record.•	It is not my duty to chase payments from clients directly. It is legal requirements and a contract between driver partner and The Plat form provider (OLA). OLA Company is obligated to obtain payment for the transportation service that we (drivers) provide to members of the public who book through the app. In my experience OLA has failed me in this regard.I have made numerous attempts to find out why I was not being paid for the work I have done and response from Ola customer care was very poor and unprofessional.•	I have also attached Toll charges for the night. The client who booked me at the beginning stayed with me throughout the 10 hour period and all of the passengers he asked me to transport asked me not to finish the trip and kept changing the address.•	On the second day, the previous client called me to hire my service for the whole night again. When he tried to book through Ola App it did not work for him. I contacted Ola but was told there were technical problems.   I then encouraged him to use Uber as I drive for both companies; however he was a bit hesitant.•	He was using different names and calling different people using codes and always checking his phone and mentioning numbers a lot. Whenever he was purchasing food or drinks he would send others with just credit card information and no card, just orders Online.  He was using Melody. A few times businesses like KFC declined to process order, he insisted he paid online but the manager said you need to pay here because that money did not go through. The client said let’s go, he conned Hungry Jacks business and ordered a lot of food. At this point I began to suspect something was not right. When I realized I was dealing with an organized syndicate who were into defrauding businesses and citizens by using stolen credit card information. •	After finalizing pick up for one of his friends I asked him to rebook again but he was unsuccessful.  After 7 hours of driving they couldn’t order through Ola or Uber and I told them can’t help you if you can’t make a request for one of the service.•	I called Policelink to report suspicious behaviour and made police statement and I am currently waiting for CCTV videos for the locations the client took me. If OLA does not pay me.   I am sharing my experience with Current Affair Media so OLA can be exposed for its dodgy business practices not to mention the unprofessional and incompetent reception drivers like me get when it comes to paying us the fees owed to us.•	I highly commend UBER Ride Share Service as I have received every cent I made with Uber App in 24 hours but have not received a cent from Ola. •	OLA has admitted that they do not have the capacity to track vehicles using their app so please consider your safety if this is the case whether you are the driver or the rider.Just to warn my fellow driver partners please don’t drive Ola cabs as they rip you off and the hard working citizens of this beautiful land.

Content: Never use ola. Absolute load of crap. Headings: Ola is hopeless, terrible app and customer care
Content: Their app is clap, I had multiple experience which left me for long to wait as screen didn’t show correct info, like car’s location, time to pick up and so on without any notifications. They kept saying they are under way to improve their system but nothing has been changed and they always respond to my complain with same answer. Their customer service is terrible as they seem not to listen to customer voice, just pretending to accept my complains. I will not use this company although I am a regular rider between home and airport. I will use other source which works heaps better.

Content: Worst worst worst and worstOla management clearly instructed to their drivers that they misbehave,  ude and whatever they can do with females. Bloody RASCALS 😡😡😡😡

Headings: Extremely poor service - a rubbish
Content: I am working as an Ola Partner and the service I received from the Ola Care is absolutely rubbish. A bad experience I have ever experienced. I had a fair from Cardiff to Bath and because of long distance journey they blocked my payments. It’s been two weeks now I have been chasing them. First thing they don’t answer your call. Secondly, if you are lucky and got hold of them they don’t do anything. They have just a script they read that they are sorry for the inconvenience. They understand my frustration, they have forwarded the query to the relevant team, they raised issue through their supervisor so it would get resolved soon HOWEVER in reality this all is a just lies they tell you. They don’t have any process in place for the complaints. I asked them many times to raise my complaint they did not. I spoke with their So-called supervisor named Aashoo on Monday this week he advised me that the issue is with top management with high ups and it will get resolved by Wednesday however it’s Friday nothing progressed. He also promised me a call back but did not happen. I am so annoyed that they don’t note the calls on account & I have to explain story again every time. A rubbish company to work with would never refer anyone Ola.

Headings: Very Bad service
Content: Very bad service. No response to person harassment and do not have proper solution to customers' ordeal. They never respond to the grievance emails nor in the phone. Their helpline is the worst i have come across. Don't even deserve single star

Headings: OLA cabs service is unfaithful and…
Content: OLA cabs service is unfaithful and scary. OLA cab drivers insist the passengers to cancel the trip when they come to pick the customers and they go with another customer if we don't accept to pay extra money.OLA charges collected money several times for one ride, OLA charged me cancellation fee when OLA driver went with another customer.OLA just wastes our time and it charges customers multiple times unnecessarily.Some times they leave the passenger in unknown locations even we give the proper destinations.

Headings: 50% off up to $10 - false advertising and bad marketing
Content: Ordered OLA for the first time while in Sydney 7/7/19. Was told by a friend to use OLA because they gave you 50% off your first 2 weeks. Happy days we thought. They actually gave us a price of $18 for the trip. So we booked them and we had a friendly driver. When we got our hotel in Sydney City, we were charged up to $36 with other fees mysteriously appearing on our account. The 50% off was actually 50% off upto a maximum $10. What a bunch of rip offs. We tried contacting them but they have no contact number. We were told on the website to send an email. We arrived at our hotel at 3pm. We got a messages back from them at 930pm. Slack service and useless customer care. Just as useless as tits on a bull. Never using them again ever. Uber for me and my family. The drives was a good man, but the company and there after service contact info is diabolical. Uber any day over OLA.

Headings: Worst company ever
Content: Worst company ever. Stay clear, ride drivers, inconsistent. Says arrived but no cars. They cancel half way through asking them where they are. Don’t waste your money or time. Use Uber

Headings: Friday 12/07/2019-First time i've used…
Content: Friday 12/07/2019-First time i've used Ola.a) After 10 minutes no car.b) Received message from Ola ( No car available).(C) Called UBER-Arrived 4 Minutes Later.(d) Ola then sends FIRST car-I told Ola I've organized with UBER.(E) Ola-sends second car ???(f) Ola then charges Cancellation fee.Conclusion -Thieves, NEVER AGAIN-More dishonest than Telstra.

Headings: Dishonest Driver
Content: I left my laptop in the Ola, Ola took 7 hours to get hold of the driver (24 hours after I had taken my trip), I had no option on my app to contact him. Driver called me 24 hours after the trip and told me that I needed to give him money for it, I said no and told him that I would meet him in a McDonald's near him or for it to be taken to a police station. Driver negotiated a price. He was only interested in making some extra cash on the side. I insisted it be taken to a police station. Driver ignored my texts and calls the next day, despite telling me he would drop it at a station. 48 hours later, I contact police who contacted the driver. An hour later my laptop was at the station. NEVER will I use again. Ola does not have a phone number and I had FIVE different staff members contact me!! Each person told me I had to contact the driver myself, WHICH I DID. Disappointing the driver was still allowed to use their app despite his dishonesty, I was also not able to change my rating that I gave him.

Headings: Watch Out for OLACABS double charging for ride
Content: I booked a cab with the cost being $28.72. I transferred $30 in the bank before booking. When I got home I check the internet banking, there was two transactions from OLACAB Melbourne for that night, the first transaction was for the $28.72 and the second one was for $28.16. Now my bank is in $26.88 arrears. This has happened to me twice now. Very disappointing will be sticking to Uber from now on. Spoke with customer support via live chat absolutely useless, they said we only have one transaction and tried to blame the bank.
